before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"bnlcf","text":"- Prepare an RNase-free environment (e.g. clean bench and pipettes, filter tips, nuclease-free solutions).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"62fos","text":"- Make sure plant material has been frozen and ground into a fine powder.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hhvh","text":"- Prepare 200 μL/sample Lysis Buffer J containing 10 μL/mL 2-mercaptoethanol (prepare before use).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ct7hb","text":"- Prepare 600 μL/sample Buffer SK containing 10 μL/mL 2-mercaptoethanol (prepare before use).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9kbuk","text":"- Ensure Wash Solution A contains ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bmqcg","text":"- Ensure you have working aliquots of RNase-free DNase I (Norgen).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"dpk14","text":"This is an adapted protocol to isolate RNA fractions enriched for nuclear and cytosolic RNAs from frozen Arabidopsis flowers using the Norgen Biotek Cytoplasmic and Nuclear RNA Purification Kit (Product # 21000) alongside the RNase-Free DNase I Kit (Norgen, # 25710).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"9uiqr","text":"- 20-50 mg of Arabidopsis flowers yields approximately 20 μg cytosolic- and 5 μg nuclear-enriched RNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55cem","text":"- Perform qRT-PCR on the resulting fractions with primers targeting mature mRNAs and pre-mRNAs (i.e. primers binding intron-exon junctions) to quantify enrichment. For example, we quantify pre-mRNA (nuclear-enriched) and mature mRNA (cytosol-enriched) of PP2AA3 (AT1G13320, mRNA: F - CGACCAAGCGGTTGTGGAGA, R -  CACAATTCGTTGCTGTCTTCTTT; pre-mRNA: F - GCTTTATGGGAAAGCTGTAAGG, R - CAACCATATAACGCACACGCC).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69pt8","text":"- We also quantify long non-coding RNAs lncCOBRA3 (AT3G03435, F - GTTGAGTCGCTTCGTCTATGT, R - TGCCATCATAGGATCCTTCAATAA) and lncCOBRA5 (AT3G05655, F - TGCACAAGTACTGGGACATC, R - GATTCGGGTCGGGTCATAAG), which show a strong enrichment in the nucleus (Kramer et al 2022, Frontiers in Plant Science).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"e1ciu","text":"- Norgen Biotek Cytoplasmic and Nuclear RNA Purification Kit (Product # 21000) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b1ks9","text":"- RNase-Free DNase I Kit (Norgen, # 25710)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c21oa","text":"- RNase-free filter tips and microcentrifuge tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"j3h9","text":"- Refrigerated benchtop centrifuge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"egmej","text":"- 2-mercaptoethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6o6sh","text":"- Ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9b4m","text":"- Sodium acetate, RNase-free (3 M, pH 5.5)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aldan","text":"- Glycogen or GlycoBlue (Invitrogen, AM9516)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1h4m8","text":"- Nuclease free water or Tris-EDTA (10 mM Tris-Cl, 0.1 mM EDTA, pH 6.5)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: Protocol is working but we are continuing to optimize

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f9g14","text":"Grind frozen Arabidopsis flowers into a fine powder using a pestle. Keep samples frozen in liquid nitrogen until you are ready to add lysis buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"la3a","text":"Remove samples from liquid nitrogen and immediately add Lysis Buffer J (200 μL per 20-50 mg tissue).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cgr2f","text":"Transfer supernatant (cytoplasmic RNA) to a clean nuclease-free tube.  Be careful not to disturb the pellet (nuclear RNA).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1565a","text":"Add 200 μL of 100% ethanol to all samples then mix vigorously for 10 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b459v","text":"Discard flow through and reassemble spin column on collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2g046","text":"Add 200 μL Buffer SK to cytoplasmic RNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Washing RNA and on-column DNase treatment (nuclear RNA only)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"70oaf","text":"Add 400 μL of Wash Solution A to the column and centrifuge 2 minutes at 14,000 rcf.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Washing RNA and on-column DNase treatment (nuclear RNA only)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"631hu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"acupt","text":"For every on-column nuclear RNA sample, mix 15 μL DNase I with 100 μL enzyme incubation buffer from the RNase-free DNase I kit (Norgen Biotek, # 25710). Mix by gentle inversion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Washing RNA and on-column DNase treatment (nuclear RNA only)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"essr8","text":"Add 100 μL of RNase-free DNase I to columns with nuclear RNA and centrifuge for 1 minute at 18,000 rcf (ensure entire DNase I solution passes through filter). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Washing RNA and on-column DNase treatment (nuclear RNA only)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c5p60","text":"Pipette flow through back onto column and incubate at 25 - 30 °C for 15 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"jvsq","text":"Perform a final wash to all tubes, discard flow through, and reassemble spin column on collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d42mq","text":"Spin the column for 2 minutes at 18,000 rcf to thoroughly dry the resin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eu8ie","text":"Transfer column to clean nuclease-free tube (discard the collection tube).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ivg0","text":"Add 50 μL of Elution Buffer E (or 10 mM Tris-Cl, 0.1 mM EDTA, pH 6.5).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cdsl9","text":"Centrifuge for 2 minutes at 200 rcf, then 1 minute at 18,000 rcf. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"enmp5","text":"Transfer lysate to a spin column on a collection tube then centrifuge for 1 minute at 18,000 rcf.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Washing RNA and on-column DNase treatment (nuclear RNA only)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1scd1","text":"Discard flow through and reassemble spin column with collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ei10","text":"Add 400 μL of Wash Solution A to all columns, centrifuge for 1 minute at 18,000 rcf, then discard flow through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9j9e1","text":"Perform a second elution step for maximum RNA recovery.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6b66l","text":"Add 0.1x volume NaOAc (3 M, pH 5.5) to samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"45uv","text":"Add Glycogen or GlycoBlue to samples to a final concentration of 50 μg/mL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fu887","text":"Incubate samples for at least 1 hour at -20 °C (O/N to maximize recovery).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"860bb","text":"Centrifuge at max speed for 30 min at 4 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4vh5t","text":"Remove supernatant and rinse pellet with 750 μL 70% (v/v) ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7upis","text":"Centrifuge at 9,200 rcf for 10 min at 4 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"djdu9","text":"Remove supernatant without disturbing pellet and allow to air dry for 1-2 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"92pso","text":"Resuspend in desired volume of nuclease-free water or Tris-EDTA (10 mM Tris-Cl, 0.1 mM EDTA, pH 6.5).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5nrsj","text":"Assess quantity and quality of RNA (e.g. visualize heat-treated RNA on a 1% TBE agarose gel, run on bioanalyzer or LabChip, Nanodrop, and/or Qubit).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fv1tr","text":"Perform qRT-PCR to test for level of enrichment by, for example, comparing mature mRNA and pre-mRNA levels in each fraction (using primers spanning intron-exon junctions).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2ub7f","text":"Centrifuge lysate for 10 minutes at max speed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9a5vu","text":"Add 3-5x volumes of 100% ethanol to samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7joc0","text":"Mix samples with gentle inversion until tissue is completely dissolved.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6l32u","text":"Mix by gentle inversion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cu1na","text":"Incubate for 3 minutes at ambient temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c3s80","text":"Add 400 μL Buffer SK to nuclear RNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fna0u","text":"Mix all samples vigorously for 10 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5l6j2","text":"Mix by flicking tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f3k8m","text":"Store RNA at -20 ºC and -80 ºC for short and long term storage, respectively.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Isolating enriched fractions of nuclear and cytoplasmic RNAs from Arabidopsis flowers
title_html: Isolating enriched fractions of nuclear and cytoplasmic RNAs from Arabidopsis flowers

versions.title: Isolating enriched fractions of nuclear and cytoplasmic RNAs from Arabidopsis flowers
versions.title_html: Isolating enriched fractions of nuclear and cytoplasmic RNAs from Arabidopsis flowers

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"a70qb","text":"2-mercaptoethanol is toxic, use in fume hood to avoid inhaling vapors and wear gloves.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
